Title: Establishes a transgender and non-binary peer support grant program
Summary: Establishes a transgender and non-binary peer support grant program which shall grant awards to eligible entities for the purpose of establishing peer-to-peer mental health programs for transgender and non-binary individuals.
LawCode: Add ยง7.49, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing a transgender and non-binary peer support grant program
